title: Trump Rally Chants, Debt Limit, 2020
itunes:title: Trump Rally Chants, Debt Limit, 2020
description:
Panel guests include: Kristen Hawn, Democratic Strategist and Senior Advisor at Rokk Solutions and Garrett Ventry, former spokesman for Senator Chuck Grassley and the Senate Judiciary Committee.

Kevin also spoke to Seth Moulton Presidential Campaign National Press Secretary Matt Corridoni who discussed Retired General Stanley McChrystal’s endorsement of Moulton’s presidential campaign.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
